Question: aliquis, aliquid
Answer: gen. alicuius, dat. alicui, etc.; idef. pron. someone, somebody, something
Name: aliquis, aliquid

Question: quisquis, quidquid
Answer: quis repeated; case other than nom. rare; indef. pron. whoever, whatever
Name: quisquis, quidquid

Question: quīdam, quaedam, quiddam
Answer: indef. pron. a certain one or thing, someone, something
Name: quīdam, quaedam, quiddam

Question: hic, haec, hoc
Answer: this, these; the latter; at times he, she, it, they;
Name: hic, haec, hoc

Question: ille, illa, illud
Answer: that, those; the former; the famous; he, she, it they
Name: ille, illa, illud

Question: iste, ista, istud
Answer: that over there, that of yours; that (contemptuous);
Name: iste, ista, istud

Question: ipse, ipsa, ipsum
Answer: himself, herself, itself; the very man, woman, thing
Name: ipse, ipsa, ipsum

Question: quis, quid
Answer: Who?, What?, Whose?, Whom?, Which/What thing?
Name: quis, quid

Question: suus, sua, suum
Answer: his own, her own, its own, their own
Name: suus, sua, suum

Question: quis, quid (after sī, nisi, nē, num)
Name: quis, quid
